documentaries.title: Tony Hawk: Until the Wheels Fall Off
documentaries.description: Feature documentary chronicling Tony Hawk’s life, career, injuries, and impact on skateboarding culture.

documentaries.title: Pretending I'm a Superman: The Tony Hawk Video Game Story
documentaries.description: Documentary about the making and cultural impact of the Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater video game series.

documentaries.title: Dogtown and Z-Boys
documentaries.description: Documentary about the Zephyr team and the rise of modern skateboarding; includes Tony Hawk in interviews/appearances reflecting on skate history.

documentaries.title: Bones Brigade: An Autobiography
documentaries.description: Documentary about the Powell-Peralta Bones Brigade team; features Tony Hawk as a central member alongside other team riders.

documentaries.title: All This Mayhem
documentaries.description: Documentary about skateboarders Tas and Ben Pappas; includes Tony Hawk in interview/appearance context within pro skateboarding.

documentaries.title: The Motivation
documentaries.description: Documentary following several professional skateboarders preparing for the Street League Skateboarding championship; includes Tony Hawk in appearances related to the competitive scene.
